title: I keep getting a BLACK SCREEN!!
body: Okay so loading up the client and sometimes a game or spectator game works fine. However when i am about 1-2 mins in the game then my whole screen turns black and i am literally not able to do anything with my computer. Im not able to alt+tab or even ctrl+alt+del to close the game.  I don't understand why this is happening now cause i have been playing league on this computer for 3 years now. It seems to have started right after this most recent patch.  If anyone else had this problem could they please help me. I just started getting into the game again and then this happens lol

replies.body: That's really strange.  Are you still able to hear any sounds while in-game, despite the black screen?

I can hear the music of the game sometimes, but any sound from like discord or even in game goes away (meaning the sounds of anything besides the  music) I've tried the repair, uninstalling and reinstalling, and even updating my gpu drivers but it still does it.

Your drivers or hardware might be failing if you can hear sounds but with a black screen, and it sucks a repair wasn't able to fix this.  Try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for some additional troubleshooting, and test it in a custom.

If the issue continues, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will work with you individually to see what's going on.
Oh yeah and now i don't hear any music anymore.
Okay i've done all of the things on the fps issues, and i have also downloaded the hextech repair and nothing.  What logs would i choose to sent to the support ticket?
